name: Magical Sabator
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to magically sabotage mechanisms or arcane equipment within 30 feet. As a reaction, you can target one crossbow or firearm, arcane focus, or magic item within range. The wielder of the object must make an Intelligence saving throw against your spell save DC, on a failure the object is sabotaged and one of the following effects takes place, depending on what the target is:

items: A crossbow or firearm malfunctions, whenever it is fired the creature must roll a 1d4, on a 1 the attack fired hits them instead, dealing the weapons normal damage to them. This effect persists until the creature uses an action to fix the weapon, no check is required.

An arcane focus becomes unstable, spell attack rolls made with it have disadvantage, and creatures have advantage on saving throws against spells cast from it. This effect persists until the creature uses an action to fix the focus, no check is required.
A magic item becomes suppressed and stops functioning until the end of your next turn.

entries: You can use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency modifier and regain all uses when you finish a long rest.
